name: ReactorGuy
description:
HI ALL!

In the game you are a volunteer that is going to delay the nuclear reactor explosion in order to enable whole town emergency evacuation. You try to fix what is breaking, but you don't know exactly how (trial and error is the key). Manage reactor heat and your radiation until everyone is safe.

PS.:

That was a ride, as for my first Ludum Dare I wanted to participate in Compo category (I don't like taking it easy). I am quite happy of my work, I finished all that I wanted so please enjoy! :D

Programs that I used:

Gimp

Aseprite

Substance 3D Designer

Blender

Unity

BoscaCeoil

sfxr

Audacity

PPS.:

Don't judge the code, it was a wild ride...
